event.description: {CovLStrv2{The application uses an asymmetric algorithm with insufficient key size, making the ciphertext data vulnerable to brute force attacks.}}

{CovLStrv2{Modify the application to adhere to the following minimum key size requirements: * 3072 bit key and 283 bit modulus for Diffie-Hellman and DSA algorithms. * 3072 bit key for RSA algorithms. * 256 bit domain parameters for elliptic curve algorithms.}}

typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: The application uses an asymmetric algorithm with insufficient key size, making the ciphertext data vulnerable to brute force attacks.
